titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2443) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal year 2004, to amend various laws administered by the Coast Guard, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-331, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2443 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 115.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 416.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/29/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2443 (Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Act of 2003).
